text: Hygrocybe griseoramosa is a mushroom of the waxcap genus Hygrocybe. It is grey or fawn in colour, and generally grows in moist, shady conditions. A rare species, it is only found near Sydney. It was described in 2001 by the mycologist Anthony M. Young.http://bie.ala.org.au/species/Hygrocybe+griseoramosa Hygrocybe griseoramosa, Index of Living Australia, retrieved June 11, 2016. ==External links== ==References== Category:Fungi described in 2001 Category:Fungi of Australia griseoramosa
title: Hygrocybe griseoramosa
